com.atm.javadoc.sample
Class ATM

java.lang.Object
  com.atm.javadoc.sample.ATM

public class ATM
extends java.lang.Object

An ATM that accesses a bank.

Constructor Detail

ATM

public ATM(Bank aBank)
Constructs an ATM for a given bank

Parameters:
aBank - the bank to which this ATM connects
Method Detail

reset

public void reset()
Resets the ATM to the initial state.

setCustomerNumber

public void setCustomerNumber(int number)
Sets the current customer number and sets state to PIN. (Precondition: state is START)

Parameters:
number - the customer number.

selectCustomer

public void selectCustomer(int pin)
Finds customer in bank. If found sets state to ACCOUNT, else to START. (Precondition: state is PIN)

Parameters:
pin - the PIN of the current customer

selectAccount

public void selectAccount(int account)
Sets current account to checking or savings. Sets state to TRANSACT. (Precondition: state is ACCOUNT or TRANSACT)

Parameters:
account - one of CHECKING or SAVINGS

withdraw

public void withdraw(double value)
Withdraws amount from current account. (Precondition: state is TRANSACT)

Parameters:
value - the amount to withdraw

deposit

public void deposit(double value)
Deposits amount to current account. (Precondition: state is TRANSACT)

Parameters:
value - the amount to deposit

getBalance

public double getBalance()
Gets the balance of the current account. (Precondition: state is TRANSACT)

Returns:
the balance

back

public void back()
Moves back to the previous state.

getState

public int getState()
Gets the current state of this ATM.

Returns:
the current state
